p.codeblock: abstract searchMusic( requestId: string, keyWord: string, page: number, pageSize: number, jsonOption?: string ): number;
abstract searchMusic( requestId: string, keyWord: string, page: number, pageSize: number, jsonOption?: string ): number;
Future<String> searchMusic( {required String keyWord, required int page, required int pageSize, String? jsonOption});
public abstract int SearchMusic(ref string requestId, string keyWord, int page, int pageSize, string jsonOption = "");

section.p: After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report the list of retrieved music resources.
After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report the list of retrieved music resources.
After successfully calling this method, the SDK triggers the callback to report the list of retrieved music resources.
After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report the retrieved music content list.

plentry.pd: Search keyword. Supports song title and artist name.
The target page number of the music resource list to retrieve.
Maximum number of music resources displayed per page. The maximum value is 50.

Extended JSON field, default is null. You can use this field to filter the music resources you need. Currently supports filtering for scorable music resources and chorus segments:
pitchType: Whether the music resource supports scoring.
1: Scorable music resource.
2: Non-scorable music resource.
needHighPart: Whether chorus segment is needed.
YES: Chorus segment needed.
NO: Chorus segment not needed.
Request ID. A unique identifier for this request.
The search keyword. Supports searching by song title or artist.
The target page number of the music resource list to retrieve.
The maximum number of music resources displayed per page. The maximum value is 50.

Extended JSON field, default is null. You can use this field to filter the music resources you need. Currently supports filtering by scorability and chorus segment:
pitchType: Whether the music resource supports scoring.
1: Scorable music resource.
2: Non-scorable music resource.
needHighPart: Whether chorus segment is needed.
YES: Chorus segment is needed.
NO: Chorus segment is not needed.
The request ID. A unique identifier for this request.
Search keyword. Supports song title and artist.
The target page number of the music resource list to retrieve.
The maximum number of music resources displayed per page. The maximum value is 50.

Extended JSON field. Defaults to . You can use this field to filter the music resources you need. Currently supports filtering scorable music resources and chorus segments:
pitchType: Whether the music resource supports scoring.
1: Scorable music resource.
2: Non-scorable music resource.
needHighPart: Whether chorus segment resources are needed.
YES: Chorus segment resources are needed.
NO: Chorus segment resources are not needed.
Search keyword. Supports song title and artist name.
The target page number of the music content list to retrieve.
Maximum number of music content items per page. The maximum value is 50.

Extended JSON field, default is . You can use this field to filter the music content you need. Currently supports filtering by whether the music is scorable and whether it has a chorus segment:
pitchType: Whether the music content supports scoring.
1: Scorable music content.
2: Non-scorable music content.
needHighPart: Whether a chorus segment is needed.
YES: Chorus segment is needed.
NO: Chorus segment is not needed.
Request ID. A unique identifier for this request.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
